metadata.title: CVE-2020-13949 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Apache Thrift 0.9.3 to 0.13.0, malicious RPC clients could send short messages which would result in a large memory allocation, potentially leading to denial of service.

criterions.comment: thrift package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
